item.title: Top 10 white sneakers under Rs 500
item.dc:creator: keyur
item.description: Let’s begin the journey Excited to upgrade your wardrobe and your footwear game!? A pair of white sneakers is a quick upgrade towards this step. Serves multiple outfits and quite pocket-friendly. We have curated the best 10 white sneakers available in the plethora of options available across the internet! Make sure to leave your valuable comments and also to share […]
item.content:encoded:
Let’s begin the journey

Excited to upgrade your wardrobe and your footwear game!? A pair of white sneakers is a quick upgrade towards this step. Serves multiple outfits and quite pocket-friendly. We have curated the best 10 white sneakers available in the plethora of options available across the internet! Make sure to leave your valuable comments and also to share with your friends and family.

1. Kraasa Casual

Price: ₹474

The simplest, yet the most elegant plain white mid-top sneaker. No other bs. Period. Pair with any clothing, still it will support you more than your ex ever did it for you. Must have this article in your wardrobe.

2. Chris and Kate everyday wear casual sneakers by Escaro

Price: ₹499

Nothing beats a classic pair of white sneakers with a subtle touch of shade in the heel tap. Be it a denim outfit or a formal attire, almost anything can be paired up with this lovely pair. It is a must-have pair in any wardrobe. Highly recommended as a first purchase.

Buy now from Amazon

3. Sparx Sd0323g Sneakers

Price: ₹576

We know, we know that it is supposed to be an under 500 list, but stretching your budget to few more pennies can significantly improve your style. The Sparx white sneakers are yet another versatile piece of footwear within budget. Have an eye on this one as the prices fall below 500 during the amazon sale.

Buy now from Amazon

4. Fashion Outdoor Canvas Casual Sneakers

Price: ₹399

The Fashion Outdoor Canvas can certainly be a doting choice, especially when you require the benefits of both a casual white sneaker and a structured style.

Buy now from Flipkart

5. Look Twice Sneakers

Price: ₹399

The name perfectly suits this article. This athleisure-style sneaker will make sure to turn heads and have another glance at them.  A perfect article for casual wear/gym wear that can easily be paired with denim/rugged style clothing.

Buy now from Flipkart

6. SANMARCO Sneakers

Price: ₹499

Wish to be playful with some colors yet be simple with the base of white? The SANMARCO serves the purpose. A blend of aesthetic colors that suits comfort style clothing. Can be added to your daily wear choices.

Buy now from Flipkart

7. Myshtezia Perfect Stylish Casual Sneakers

Price: ₹448

This one is specifically for the ladies out there. Flaunt this really elegant pair along with your beauty and observe the hearts falling for you. Perfect for casual/everyday wear. The black and white combination incorporates most of style.

Buy now from Flipkart

8. Azeraa Colorfull Sneakers

Price: ₹449

This is for those who wanna step outside of their comfort zone. Bounded by no restriction of “a typical white sneaker”, they really stand out of the crowd. Best styled with denim.

Buy now from Amazon

9. Amazon Brand - Symbol PU sneakers

Price: ₹499

Fan of skate sneakers but couldn’t find any cheap but high-quality pair? Symbol PU is a must-try for all such fam. 

Buy now from Amazon

10. Robbie jones Casual Sneakers Shoes

Price: ₹474

It shares some of it’s aspect with the Chris and Kate everyday wear casual sneaker, both having shade on the heel tap and quite similar overall look. This particular pair is our favorite especially because of the heel tap shade and also coz it’s a mid top sneaker.  

Buy now from Flipkart
